values.name: Night
values.description: What night the player is currently on.

values.name: Star 1
values.description: The first star, obtained for beating Night 5.

values.name: Star 2
values.description: The second star, obtained for beating Night 6.

values.name: Star 3 / 20/20/20/20
values.description: The third star and first challenge star, obtained for beating the '20/20/20/20' challenge.

values.name: New and Shiny
values.description: The second challenge star obtained for beating the 'New and Shiny' challenge.

values.name: Double Trouble
values.description: The third challenge star obtained for beating the 'Double Trouble' challenge.

values.name: Night of Misfits
values.description: The fourth challenge star obtained for beating the 'Night of Misfits' challenge.

values.name: Foxy Foxy
values.description: The fifth challenge star obtained for beating the 'Foxy Foxy' challenge.

values.name: Ladies Night
values.description: The sixth challenge star obtained for beating the 'Ladies Night' challenge.

values.name: Freddy's Circus
values.description: The seventh challenge star obtained for beating the 'Freddy's Circus' challenge.

values.name: Cupcake Challenge
values.description: The eighth challenge star obtained for beating the 'Cupcake Challenge' challenge.

values.name: Fazbear Fever
values.description: The ninth challenge star obtained for beating the 'Fazbear Fever' challenge.

values.name: Golden Freddy
values.description: The tenth challenge star obtained for beating the 'Golden Freddy' challenge.

values.name: Next Minigame
values.description: The ID of the next minigame you will play.

values.name: Intro Cinematic
values.description: Whether or not you've seen the intro cinematic.
